name: Makeup Salon - DIY Makeup game
description:
"Hey, girls! Welcome to the fashion beauty salon makeup game!
Wanna always stay in the limelight at parties?
Wanna be a strong businesswoman that shines in every meeting?
Wanna look fabulous and win over prince charming's heart on a date?

Join Makeup Salon. We will help you quickly and easily become a master in the art of makeup"
